mapper.sql: id, content, read_times AS readTimes, title, publish_time AS publishTime, operator, operate_ip AS operateIp, operate_time AS operateTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (content, title, read_times, publish_time, operator, operate_ip, operate_time) VALUES (#{content}, #{title}, 0, now(), #{operator}, #{operateIp}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET content = #{content}, title = #{title}, operator = #{operator}, operate_ip = #{operateIp}, operate_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM article ORDER BY id DESC limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
